title: Ep. 43 "She Smashed The Homies" ft. Messiah Da Rapper
description:
What are your dating rules? Could you date someone who slept with one of the homies a loongggg time ago? Should women be honest about their "body counts"? Does it really matter? And if it does why?! This week The ladies invited "A Pimp Named Sweet Tooth" , 1/2 of Snoop Doggs super group the Southern Playas AKA "Messiah da Rapper" on the show to talk about why he prefers "outings" to "dating" and what goes in to picking Mrs. Right.



Shoutout to our sponsors this week!



Mailform

Check it out at www.mailform.io



Check out our last bachelor's book:

Own Or Be Owned: The Black Man's Guide to Wealth Creation
